name: Five Nights At Smog's
description:
You are taking a night shift, in a poutinerie restaurant in The York, a large city in a undisclosed location. This restaurant is named "Smog's Poutinerie".
Throughout the night your job is to maintain the poutinerie, listen to the calls you receive, as your co-worker on the day shift will help you throughout each night.
But be careful, As your co-worker speaks of this unknown monster, and the weird traits it has, and of course, how to keep safe from it.
Will you be able to survive 5 nights at Smog's Poutinerie? keeping track of your Sanity, Audibility, and the monster? Find out on July 8th
Don't keep the monster waiting my friend.

Early Access will only have one playable night

Smog's History

The idea for Five Nights At Smog's Originally came from Maxwell, who then put together a team to create this project.
Five Nights At Smog's was originally done as a school project, but we three developers want to take this game to the next level.

Developers: Maxwell, Aiden, Ben : ForReal Game Studios.

Music Producer: Aiden Desjarlais
